mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.GALLERY_NO, A.GALLERY_TITLE, A.GALLERY_CONTENT, A.CREATE_DATE, A.MODIFY_DATE, A.HIT, A.WRITER_IP, A.ID FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GALLERY_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, GALLERY_NO, GALLERY_TITLE, GALLERY_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, HIT, WRITER_IP, ID FROM GALLERY) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GALLERY (GALLERY_NO, GALLERY_TITLE, GALLERY_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, HIT, WRITER_IP, ID) VALUES (GALLERY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{galleryTitle}, #{galleryContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, #{writerIp}, #{id})
